name: Sir Nok: Escape From Hell
description:
Sir Nok spent his life slaying monsters until one day he was just a little too slow and one got him.   Well, at least he will get to rest in peace or not. Sir Nok now must fight his way out of hell.

Controls:

  •  wasd keys for movement and spacebar or left mouse for attack
  • A controller should work with the south button being attack (untested) menus currently don't work with the controller

Notes: 

Under Development currently until jam ends Monday evening.

Short game created for the gamedev.tv 2022 game jam. 

Theme: Death is only the beginning

Source  Code: https://gitlab.com/TDog/deathbeginning

Attributions for assets used are in the readme file in the source code.
